repnme.cdata!: Rwanda - Banque Rwandaise de Developpement Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist in financing:
            (i) BRD's foreign exchange requirements for its
            development finance operations through mid-1978; and (ii)
            audits of BRD's accounts for 1976, 1977 and 1978.
